text: @ResisterDude @realDonaldTrump Those going against med &scientific recommendations should have to sign a waiver prohibiting them from rcvg med care OR putting them in line to be treated last if they get covid19 aftr behaving recklessly.Not fair to put med staff & the public in danger due to their ignorance..
